Name: The Last Job
About the game: 'I worked with someone I met online. They would tip me off about good houses to sack. They knew everything. When the owners are out, what's inside the place, where are the cameras, back doors or alarms. I never asked them for more.' 'The Last Job' is a first person puzzle horror game, where the player becomes a thief and unravels gruesome details about the place he broke into. Explore the mysterious house that holds very dark secrets, solve the puzzle, and make it out alive. Features: Atmospheric environment Jumpscares Relatively short and intense experience Gameplay time may vary depending on players ability to solve the puzzle. Approximate time to finish the game is 30 min.
